settings.title: Payment methods
settings.text:
We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Shop Pay, and Apple Pay.

We may contact your bank to verify if the billing address and phone number entered on Vidlogix.com match the address where your credit card company sends your statements to protect you from unauthorized purchases.

settings.title: When will I be charged?
settings.text: When you place an order, vidlogix.com contacts the issuing bank to confirm the payment method's validity. Your bank reserves the funds until the entire transaction processes or the authorization expires, but this isn't an actual charge. We will post payment upon shipment or within six calendar days. Contact your bank to clarify how long they hold authorizations for online orders to remove an authorization. You can cancel an order at any time before shipment, at no cost to you, byÂ contacting support.
